About This Game

The new project from the creator of the legendary series Resident Evil Shinji Mikami and talented team of developers Tango Gameworks, The Evil Within - a true embodiment of the genre Survival Horror. The world will turn upside down, pulling you into the insidious tangled intrigue and the cycle of nightmares. Can you break the cycle? Latest technology lighting and animation, available through the engine id Tech 5, realistic creatures surround you sick imagination and experience will make a real animal fear and find out what dark force is behind the incident.

Features Of This Game

- Return to the origins of the genre. Shinji Mikami - the founder of the genre of Survival Horror. He created the story is fascinating and frightening at the same time . Anxiety and fear are growing continuously for as you explore the game world through distorted . Hero to fight for his life , using the limited arsenal of features. Burning a mixture of thriller and action movie will make you experience the horror of the highest standard .

- Treacherous traps and monstrous foes . Unbelievable horror, cruel and diabolical traps mechanisms - all this will stand in the way of the hero to the rescue . But evil can and should be turned against itself - the crowds of deadly enemies will be defeated themselves infernal inventions inflamed consciousness.

- Unknown dangers unseen world . Fragile game world is constantly changing and distorted , giving rise to new horrors . Walls , corridors , doors and even whole buildings can suddenly transform , knocking the hero confused and further enticing to a world where anything can not be sure .

- The revival of the genre. Artfully crafted landscape, constant fear and intricate storyline - all this creates a unique game world , which from the beginning to the end keeps you at the peak voltage . Can you overcome the most important enemy: the inhuman horror , devouring you from the inside ?

- The Assignment - this plot addition to the horror-action games The Evil Within, lets look at the events of the game from a different angle. This is the first part of the story detective Judy Kidman, the mysterious sidekick Sebastian Kastallanosa. From this parallel storyline you know where is the heroine was during the events that have unfolded in the world of The Evil Within. On his way Julie meet many new and terrible enemies, and will discover a lot of new mysteries ... often very creepy. The Assignment gives fans The Evil Within the opportunity to learn all about the ulterior motives detective Kidman, as well as its involvement in the "Mobius - a mysterious organization allegedly responsible for the terrible events that took place in the original game.

- The Consequence - the second and final part of the story of Julia Kidman. You can play as a detective Kidman, mysterious companion Sebastian Castellanos , and find out where she's been during the events The Evil Within. Julia will meet a creepy new enemies , reveal new secrets and face new nightmares.
